titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.
Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: Prohibits the House of Representatives from considering H.R. 3 (Northern Route Approval Act) because: (1) it violates Rule XXI (Restrictions on Certain Bills) of the Rules of the House, and (2) it affects the dignity and integrity of the House proceedings since it is unconstitutional.
